gen:link.msg:message: `NumberOfHomesAboveCutOffLimit` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `MunicipalityAxis`, omdat `MunicipalityAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU3_Set00MunicipalityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU3_Set00MunicipalityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfHomesAboveLiberalisation` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `MunicipalityAxis`, omdat `MunicipalityAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU4_Set00MunicipalityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU4_Set00MunicipalityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfHomesAboveQuality` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `MunicipalityAxis`, omdat `MunicipalityAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU2_Set00MunicipalityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU2_Set00MunicipalityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated` MOET gelijk zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_ChildrenOfNumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_ChildrenOfNumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated` MOET ook gerapporteerd worden, omdat minimaal één van de onderliggende waarden van `NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated` wordt gerapporteerd. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfNumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfNumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfIndependentPropertiesEqualBelowQuality` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `MunicipalityAxis`, omdat `MunicipalityAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00MunicipalityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00MunicipalityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
